Description: The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (comparison)              {                  case ExceptionMessageComparison.Exact:                      Assert.AreEqual(exception.Message' message);                      break;                    case ExceptionMessageComparison.Contains:                      Assert.IsTrue(exception.Message.Contains(message));                      break;                    case ExceptionMessageComparison.StartsWith:                      Assert.IsTrue(exception.Message.StartsWith(message));                      break;                    case ExceptionMessageComparison.EndsWith:                      Assert.IsTrue(exception.Message.EndsWith(message));                      break;              }
